attributes.action: Stop accept false allegations  from mothers just so they can exploit the system
attributes.additional_details:
Cafcass workers who like to be biased to the mother were they dont turn up for a appointment,mediation or even a parenting course yet if that is the father hes instantly being made the person this had got to stop.

Mother telling there children lies to poison them against there fathers thinking its a game when all there doing is hurting there children yet no punishment is done but there is for the father who reports it .
attributes.background: Countless men have allegations where there is no evidence thrown at them and women get everything from legal aid free actual anti-molestation orders were you dont need proof or evidence to take the child away whilst they get away with abuse but what you say makes no difference  your lying everytime

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the family courts, which are independent of both the Government and Parliament.

There's already a petition about this issue, which you might like to sign and share if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257930
